title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 6
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dave Wilson's Stock of the Day for June 6
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010David Wilson\u0010Stocks Editor\u0010Bloomberg News\u0010Discussing his "Stock of the Day" SecureWorks (SCWX). SecureWorks Corp.'s shares are headed for their biggest one-day decline since the security-software maker went public about 14 months ago. The company widened its fiscal-year loss forecasts after first-quarter figures trailed analysts' average estimates in a Bloomberg survey. SecureWorks said it's spending more on its sales force in order to spur second-half revenue growth.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
